Text:
there is only one SRT file, it's missing the English and Spanish

what have you people got against Rar files anyway?

english subtitles here: http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/subtitles/3501307/dod-sno-en

@splurgegun: Considering the design of torrents, using rars for error checking or having a lot of  small files to transfer instead of one big one is superfluous. Using rars in a torrent has the added benefit of hiding the real filenames after the rar has been extracted, in addition to requiring the unnecessary extraction process. Finding rars in torrents infuriates me. Perhaps this is your aim?
